name: QueensJS
resume: Queens, New York's premier JavaScript Meetup! Sister Meetup.

name: BrooklynJS
resume: The world's most popular programming language, in New York's most popular borough.

name: manhattan.js
resume: We're a combination of Ruby, Javascript and CSS [yes CSS] developers and we aim to bring the greatest programming minds to Manhattan once a month to chat, teach and learn from.

name: EmpireJS
resume: We are back again! Bringing you speakers on cutting edge of Javascript: in the Browser, on the Server, with robots and hardware, and in ways we don’t even know yet!

name: RubyConf
resume: RubyConf is visiting sunny San Diego this year from November 17-19, 2014, where we'll be celebrating all things Ruby while enjoying warm breezes off the Pacific Ocean.

name: CascadiaJS
resume: CascadiaJS is a two-day, community-driven conference on the cutting edge of JavaScript. Browser, server, OS – we cover it all.

name: ng-conf
resume: The first CSS conference for Web designers and developers returns on October 13-15, 2014 in the fascinating city of New Orleans, USA.

name: CSS Dev Conf
resume: The first CSS conference for Web designers and developers returns on October 13-15, 2014 in the fascinating city of New Orleans, USA.

name: HTML5DevConf
resume: Join the largest JavaScript and HTML5 Developer Conference in the world. Leading edge speakers at a developer friendly price.

name: Forward JS
resume: San Francisco rally on February 4, 2015 featuring some of the most forward looking technologies on the web. Minds will be blown.

name: Edge Conf
resume: A day of group discussion and debate on advanced web technologies for developers and browser vendors, raising funds for Hack the Hood.

name: Nodevember
resume: We're a Node and Javascript conference located in Nashville, TN happening November 15th and 16th.

name: MidwestJS
resume: Midwest JS is a premier technology conference focused on the JavaScript ecosystem. The conference will be held for the first time in downtown Minneapolis at the University of St. Thomas.

name: JSConf
resume: JSConf is a unique conference organization, because we aren't really a conference organization at all. We are a very loose federation of developers who share the same general idea about how a technical conference should be held.

name: oakland.js
resume: A weekly free + public hangout for JavaScript enthusiasts that happens in Oakland, California. No presentations, RSVPs or startup pitches/overt recruiting allowed, just show up and talk, learn and hack!

name: jQuery Conference
resume: We're making our first trip to Chicago to bring together experts from across the field of front-end development to bring you up to speed on the latest open web technologies. Get the latest on jQuery and related projects, code architecture and organization, design and implementation practices, tooling and workflow improvements, and emerging browser technologies.

name: Strange Loop Conf
resume: Strange Loop is a multi-disciplinary conference that aims to bring together the developers and thinkers building tomorrow's technology in fields such as emerging languages, alternative databases, concurrency, distributed systems, mobile development, and the web.

name: O'Reilly Strata
resume: Strata is more than a conference. It’s the essential training and information source for data science and big data—with industry news, reports, in-person and online events, and much more.

name: RealtimeConf
resume: RealtimeConf assembled the diverse developers and doers pushing forward the bleeding edge of the web. The &yet team put our whole crazy/creative/risky hearts into it, hoping to inspire our community to help bring open communication to the Open Web.

name: nodeconf
resume: NodeConf!

name: DjangoCon
resume: Almost everyone who attends this conference develops Django, or uses Django to develop applications. Many do both. So this event is the place to meet and interact with Django developers.

name: EmberConf
resume: For day and week-of updates on the first ever EmberConf, March 25-26 2014. See you there!
